comments.subject: Best Bag Ever
comments.comment: I absolutely love this bag. If you're on the fence about buying this bag, JUST DO IT!!!

comments.subject: Nice, Nice, Nice
comments.comment: Nice and cute. perfect. I absolutely love this bag. Just like the photo very nice and very good quality

comments.subject: Perfect
comments.comment: I liked it so much, I would buy it again.

comments.subject: Comfortable shoes
comments.comment: Running shoes with cushioning and durability that deliver what it promises, in addition to being very comfortable and beautiful.

comments.subject: Great fit; the color, though‚Ä¶
comments.comment: I love it. Great quality. Just the color is a little disappointing, but It doesn't stop me from enjoying my new shoes.

comments.subject: Recommend
comments.comment: I'm very pleased with this purchase. The build quality and choice of materials are excellent.

comments.comment: Good quality.It's beautiful out of the box. I've been using it for a few weeks.

comments.comment: Cheaply made.This is cute, but it's not made well. I had used it three times and the strap broke.

comments.subject: Seems Nice for the Money, But Runs Small
comments.comment: These shoes fit a little snug, but I don't think I would have been better off going 1/2 size larger.

comments.subject: Like it
comments.comment: This bag is so cute and holds a lot.So it's definitely the smallest purse I've ever had and yet still holds a ton of stuff. My only complaints are that the zippers only zip one way

comments.subject: The Worst Purchase ever
comments.comment: I received mine also with no straps and not the one I ordered. It was a good size, perfect for sunglasses, your cell phone and a wallet. But the outside just looks cheap.

comments.subject: I'm really happy
comments.comment: This shoe was really light and bouncy, with a good base and good stability

comments.subject: Good one
comments.comment: I really like the look and feel of these shoes. They fit my feet well. The only weird thing about these shoes is that on the bottom of heel it pops like a popping sound I dont know why it does

comments.subject: Nice, recommend it
comments.comment: They are ideal in the photo but more beautiful when you arrive

comments.subject: Fit well
comments.comment: Got these in the extra wide and they feel great right out of the box unlike other which are made for tiny little people with tiny little feet

comments.subject: Of good quality
comments.comment: Delighted with my purchase because it is a very practical and well-designed bag, with several separate spaces that allow optimal storage. THE MOST of this product is its color and material that make this bag a real all-purpose bag that we can wear all the time without worrying about the outfit we are wearing at the moment.
